channel.title: Which Source?
channel.description:
I've been trying to run 508's (stock) to no avail. All my 317's work though.
So my question... I am looking for a good stabil source, that is not focused on PKing. I don't mind if the wildy allows it, however i do NOT want it everywhere.
Also, i want the server to be as close to real RS as possible, with the exception of faster XP. Other perks are alright too, but I don't want the towns/NPC's to be misplaced too much.
I was recently playing a server that has been taken down called WebsterScape. That was as close to what i wanted as ever, however i don't know which source they were using.
Thanks!

item.title: Which Source?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“djspanke, post:4, topic:286301”]I am thinking of dling a blank source, and making one.[/quote]Good luck, you’ll need it along with 50 hours to waste your life.

Read full topic

item.title: Which Source?
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

I am thinking of dling a blank source, and making one.

Read full topic

item.title: Which Source?
item.dc:creator: @xXGeminiXx xXGeminiXx
item.description:
@xXGeminiXx wrote:

My point being that there isn’t too much modification to the layout and NPC’s. I dont want it to have 50 npc’s all standing around you when you log in. I don’t want dragons standing in varrock where they shouldn’t be. I don’t mind the fact that things will not be included, but i don’t want the things included to be completely different than RS is.

Read full topic

item.title: Which Source?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

RuneScape was formed for over 8 years; nobody has a server that is anywhere near close to RuneScape.

Read full topic
